message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to start with a price of $1200000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $900000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1100000. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair price.

I understand that you need to make a profit, but $1100000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counteroffer at $950000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with $950000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to be closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $1050000. This is as low as I can go, and I'm hoping we can finally reach an agreement.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $1050000 is still not within my budget. I'm willing to go up a bit, but I need to be closer to my target. I'll counteroffer at $980000. This is my last offer, and I hope we can finally reach an agreement.
